name: Let me RIP
description:
Part of the GameDev.tv 2022 Jam (Death is only the beginning)

How to "Play"

WASD to move the Camera

You will follow the mouse.

When near other ghost, press space to show it the consequences of trespassing on your property. You can tell it's working if it makes noises.

This is made more difficult by the questionable theme music.
